nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Vegetarian Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Diet excluding meat and fish, focusing on plant-based foods.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Vegan Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Diet excluding all animal products, including dairy and eggs.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Gluten-Free Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Avoiding gluten found in wheat, barley, and rye due to intolerance or celiac disease.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Lactose Intolerance
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Difficulty digesting lactose in dairy products.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Nut Allergies
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Allergic reactions to tree nuts or peanuts.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Shellfish Allergies
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Allergic reactions to crustaceans and mollusks.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Kosher Dietary Laws
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Dietary practices adhering to Jewish dietary laws.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Halal Dietary Guidelines
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Dietary practices adhering to Islamic law.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Diabetic-Friendly Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Managing blood sugar levels through diet.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Low-Carbohydrate Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Reducing carbohydrate intake to promote weight loss or control blood sugar.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Low-Sodium Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Limiting sodium intake to manage blood pressure.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Low-Fat Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Reducing fat intake for health reasons.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Paleo Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Eating foods presumed to have been available to Paleolithic humans.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Ketogenic (Keto) Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: High-fat, low-carb diet to induce ketosis.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Pescatarian Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Vegetarian diet that includes fish and seafood.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Food Allergies
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Allergic reactions to specific foods like eggs, soy, or wheat.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: High-Protein Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Increasing protein intake for muscle building or weight management.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Organic Food Preference
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Choosing foods produced without synthetic pesticides or fertilizers.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Non-GMO Food Preference
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Avoiding genetically modified organisms in food.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Low FODMAP Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Diet low in certain carbohydrates to manage IBS symptoms.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Sugar-Free Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Eliminating added sugars for health reasons.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: High-Fiber Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Increasing fiber intake for digestive health.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Raw Food Diet
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Consuming uncooked, unprocessed foods.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Intermittent Fasting
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Alternating cycles of fasting and eating.

nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.name: Pregnancy-Related Dietary Restrictions
nutritional_or_dietary_restrictions.description: Avoiding certain foods for prenatal health.
